lexUnit.name: sleep.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: rest in a regularly recurring condition of body and mind in which the nervous system is inactive, the eyes closed, the postural muscles relaxed, and consciousness practically suspended.

sentence.text: I was exhausted , and slept for two hours .
He slept deeply until around 9.30 , when he arose , breakfasted , and took his children out for a walk .
Bronwen reported the next day that Owen had slept deeply for about six hours , and for the first time in ages had not woken up several times during the night to go to the toilet .
He slept well on the sofa .
Jerry slept at the wall-end , with me in the centre , while Sam occupied the end which was next to the other bed .
I ca n't sleep at nights from thinking of those dreadful things you describe .
How well do you sleep at night ?
She had shrugged off her clothes , crawled under the sheets , and slept for hours .
In his pensione Sandison slept for two hours in the afternoon .
After she had swallowed the sleeping tablets , Carolyn slept for fourteen hours .
When we were four and five we had to sleep in the afternoons on long mats made of shiny grass that left ribbing marks on our skin .
He did n't take me on his knee any longer , and I slept in a bed of my own .
He slept on park benches , in packing boxes , and he even slept in holes in the ground with a strip of linoleum for a blanket .
Anyway , I have to sleep in Zen and Crystal 's bedroom every other week and it 's a right bore .
It seemed that Heathcliff 's room was locked , and there were no guest bedrooms , so in the end I slept on a chair in the child 's room .
` Did you sleep on the plane ? " she asked .
Once she was driving home from a riotous party in the French countryside in order to allow Bernard to sleep on the back seat .
Sammy slept under the navigator 's table and never seemed to have any reaction to the gyration of the aircraft or the attention of the natives with their flak and fighters outside .
George slept until six o'clock , and was then awakened by the telephone .
If you 're on one of the cruising courses you 'll be sleeping aboard your yacht .
` You slept for about half an hour , " he told her .
Darnley slept , and I wrote letters to my friends .
